home.title: Welcome to WiseCookie

predict.title: Model Prediction

about.title: About the Prediction Model
about.description1: Our prediction model is based on ensemble learning methods, integrating multiple machine learning algorithms to accurately predict comprehensive cookie quality scores based on physicochemical characteristics.
about.description2: This platform aims to help food R&D personnel quickly evaluate formulation feasibility, optimize production processes, and improve product development efficiency.
